text: Koffi Christian Romaric N'Dri (born 4 June 1983), commonly known as Romaric, is an Ivorian former professional footballer and current manager of Ligue 1 club AFAD Djékanou. ==Club career statistics== |- |2003–04||rowspan="2"|Beveren||rowspan="2"|First Division||12||5 |- |2004–05||32||13 |- |2005–06||rowspan="3"|Le Mans||rowspan="3"|Ligue 1||21||0 |- |2006–07||35||5 |- |2007–08||33||2 |- |2008–09||rowspan="2"|Sevilla||rowspan="2"|La Liga||36||1 |- |2009–10|||| 44||18 89||7 36||1 169||26 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2005||3||0 |- |2006||6||0 |- |2007||8||0 |- |2008||4||0 |- |2009||7||3 |- |2010|||| |- !Total||28||3 |} ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Ivory Coast at the 2006 FIFA World Cup Category:Ivory Coast at the 2010 FIFA World Cup Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan
title: Koffi Ndri Romaric
